TopicTitle: Kingplatypus, ready to blow up on the launch pad.

Articles.Content: Hello everyone! I found out about this game from some friends of mine in Eve online and the few hours of the game that I have played has convinced me that this game is ridiculously awesome. I look forward to crashing into planets at supersonic speeds due to bad rocket designs with you all.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
